```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
df <- read.csv("/Users/jiayin/Desktop/monthly_usage_filtered.csv")
head(df)
```

```{r}
df[,'year']<-factor(df[,'year'])
df[,'month']<-factor(df[,'month'])
ggplot(df, aes(x=month, y = num_trips, group = year, color = year)) + geom_line() + facet_grid(rows = vars(year)) + 
  ggtitle("Number of Trips by Year") + xlab("Month") + ylab("Trips")
```
